comments.body:
```suggestion
  - apt, added a 'lock_timeout' to be more resilient when encountering the apt db already locked and handle it w/o having to rerun task (https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/74095).
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@minor_changes:
  - apt, added a 'lock_timeout' to be more resilient when encountering the apt db already locked and handle it w/o haveing to rerun task.
